creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: irregular, rectangular shaped vessel with downward sloping top; tapered edges; narrowing towards one end; rectangular opening on top L of center; rectangular textured band on one end; larger, textured band on opposite end; dark glaze with red undertones; ocher colored veins of color inside
marks: Signature Inscribed bottom center, one character
title: Vase
